content:
For those that were interested in the possibility of custom lints, please check out the thread I created on IRLO. It links to a HackMD where I've written out my thoughts.

https://internals.rust-lang.org/t/towards-a-stable-compiler-api-and-custom-lints/15048?u=jhpratt

I'll be a bit busy today, but I'll be sure to respond to everyone.
